title: Efficient removal of piperazine by catalytic wet air oxidation using RuNiCe/Î³-Al2O3-activated carbon
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1653-1665
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00177J, Paper
Quanhui Zheng, Kaiwen Ren, Lin Qin, Xin Wang, Jianchao Ma
The RuNiCe/AAC catalyst represents an efficacious solution for the treatment of industrial wastewater, particularly in instances where the concentration of chemical oxygen demand (COD) and ammonia nitrogen (NH3-N) is elevated.
